introduce.en: NodePacific Tech is a leading blockchain company in Asia. Based in Hong Kong, we build both local and global communities for those who have interests in Asia-Pacific regions. We provide Asia-Pacific access and one-stop solutions for global developers. We are currently promoting EOS technology and working to be an EOS block producer candidate. more details: https://steemit.com/eospacific/@eos.pacific/eos-pacific-block-producer-candidacy-announcement
introduce.zh: 节点亚太（NodePacific Tech）是亚洲领先的区块链科技公司，总部设在香港。我们建立本地和全球社区，为所有对亚太地区感兴趣的开发者提供亚太通道和一站式解决方案。 目前我们正在推广EOS技术，并致力于成为EOS区块生产者候选人。 详见：https://steemit.com/eospacific/@eos.pacific/eos-pacific-block-producer-candidacy-announcement
